Class CompanyRepresentativeView

java.lang.Object
src.view.UserView
src.view.CompanyRepresentativeView
All Implemented Interfaces:
viewApplication, viewInternship
public class CompanyRepresentativeView extends UserView implements viewInternship, viewApplication
View layer for Company Representative user interface.

Provides a menu-driven interface for company representatives to register accounts, authenticate, manage internship postings (create, edit, delete, toggle visibility), review and approve/reject student applications, and generate reports. Extends UserView for authentication and implements viewInternship and viewApplication for viewing internships and applications.

  • Method Details

    • start

      public void start()
      Starts the company representative view by displaying the startup menu.

      Presents options to login or register as a company representative. Routes to appropriate handler based on user selection.

      Specified by:
      start in class UserView

    • viewApplications

      public void viewApplications()
      Displays all internship applications assigned to this company representative.

      Retrieves applications from the controller and displays each one with its index, showing application details. Shows a message if no applications exist.

      Specified by:
      viewApplications in interface viewApplication

      Parameters:

    • viewInternships

      public void viewInternships()
      Displays all internships created by this company representative.

      Retrieves internships from the controller and displays each one with its index. Shows a message if no internships exist.
